positive_examples: This is an example of glycogen.
We observed glycogen in this context.
A typical case of glycogen would involve these features.
The concept of glycogen applies here.
A branched polysaccharide that serves as the primary form of glucose storage in animals and fungi.
negative_examples: This is an example of starch, not glycogen.
The document was filed in the cabinet.
She walked to the store to buy groceries.
training_hints.disambiguation: Not to be confused with: Starch, or other types of Carbohydrate

definition: A branched polysaccharide serving as energy storage in animals.
